p: A complete description of the model is available in S1 Appendix. Briefly, both model variants include a generalized linear model (GLM) fitted to the presence or absence of any reported YF event between 1984 and 2013 at the first sub-national administrative level (province) ( S1 Table), using various environmental and demographic covariates together with a country-based proxy for surveillance quality. We defined a reported YF event as either outbreak reports published by WHO or laboratory-confirmed cases reported in a YF surveillance database managed by WHO-AFRO, to which 21 countries contribute.
